CatDescriptText: The construction of the Civic Arena in the Lower Hill district.  Parts of Wylie Avenue, Crawford Street, Fullerton Avenue and Webster Avenue were demolished to make room for the large silver dome.  These streets were significant business and cultural centers of the Hill District prior to their demolition.  Construction of the arena began in 1958.
TitMainTitle: Wylie Avenue at Crawford Street intersection looking toward Downtown, with Civic Arena construction in background, Lower Hill District
